Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Votes.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Title: Authorizes a licensee with a license to sell wine at retail for consumption on the premises to include the sale of shochu on such premise to be consumed under the same terms and conditions
Summary: Authorizes a licensee with a license to sell wine at retail for consumption on the premises to include the sale of shochu on such premises to be consumed under the same terms and conditions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to authorizing a licensee with a license to sell wine at retail for consumption on the premises to include the sale of shochu on such premises to be consumed under the same terms and conditions
